title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Perth, Australia
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat will be hosted at Spacecubed by ThoughtWorks Australia Pty. Ltd.

Hi All, 
Just a note that we will still be running this even if there are only a few RSVPs. It'll just be more personal :) 
If you are thinking of coming, but haven't RSVP'd, please do so now to ensure there will be adequate food for lunch. 
Looking forward to it!
Thanks Brad!
